title: What are rioter support working hours?
body: What are rioter support working hours?

replies.body: Just send the ticket, when they will be able to reply, they will(usually in 12-24h).

They replied to me after 3 days now(problem with hacking into my account), and it has been locked atm...the problem is that i still want to try to get to gold but I can't play and I was wondering if there is any possibility they might do something in the next hours or i'll have to wait until tomorrow
In this particular case it is normal that they need some days to check that you are the real owner of the account. The only thing you can do is just wait.
